title: OnThree20 two bedroom (1013 sq-ft) apartment for immediate sale (Facing Pool View).
details:
TWO Bedroom Apartment For Immediate Sale At OnThree20 Colombo 02.

This Is A 02 Bedroom Apartment With 02 Toilets With A Spectacular View Of The Sea & Swimming Pool.

Two Bedroom: 907 Sq-Ft & 1013 Sq-Ft

Three Bedroom: 1228 Sq-Ft & 1312 Sq-Ft

Apartments Available in Tower 1, 2 & 3.

Facilities Such As:

Car Park, Swimming Pool, Gymnasium, Visitor Car Parking, Large Club House, Business Center, Squash Court & Indoor Room.

Walking Distance To Cargills & Keels super market.

Laundry + shopping facility, 24 hours security, Designated parking

For Viewing And Other Further Information Of The Apartment, Please Do Not Hesitate In Contacting Us
